name: PANICK
description:
A solo-developed project for this year LGD's, 48hr Quarantine Game Jam. #NdabJam

With the theme of 'PACK', PANICK is an immersive experience with mechanics quite fitting to the conditions of living in today's climate.

Here is a snippet of the dialogue!

itsreginemate · PANICK GAME_Tp LOL

CONTROLS

Movement - W A S D or Arrows

Open/close - Left click or 'E'

Interact - 'E'

Dev Notes:

I am not a programmer, this is the extent of my c# skills lel
